column5: My wife and I were sitting at a table at her high school reunion, and she kept staring at a drunken guy swigging his drink as he sat alone at  a nearby table.  So, I asked my wife, 'Do you know him?'  'Yes,' she sighed, 'He's my old boyfriend. I understand he took to drinking right after we split up  those many years ago, and I hear he hasn't been sober since.'  'My God!' I said 'Who would think a person could go on celebrating that long?'
Thanks for that... I've been getting some mileage out of that one here at work. HH
Last night came home from work, exhausted, and the wife says she wants to go out somewhere expensive.....    So I took her to the gas station.  ....And that's when the fight started.
